message: You can't have it all, Alice!
Not fair, Bob! I want a better deal!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
That's not fair, Bob! I want a better deal!
Let's find a middle ground, Bob!
You're running out of time, Alice!
No way, Bob! I'm not going down to 20%!
You're getting desperate, Bob! Meet me at 70-30!
You're getting close to zero, Alice!
No way, Bob! I'm not going down to 10%!
Let's end this, Bob. 40-60 is the best I can do!
